encodingDesc.p: The following text is encoded in accordance with EpiDoc standards and with the CTS/CITE Architecture.

div.p: Accedunt loci similes isdem ex fontibus oriundi.

Quibus locis asteriscns (*) praepositus est, iis auctorum aut nomina aut
uerba ipsa a scriptore adferuntur.l)
